data.value: About Tweak Utility

data.name: About_Copyright
data.value: All icons used (except the application icon), belong to their rightful owners.

data.name: About_Description
data.value: Tweak Utility is an application for tweaking Windows, as well as other applications, similar to Tweak UI and Winaero Tweaker.

data.name: About_License
data.value: Tweak Utility is available on {0}, and licensed under GPL-3.0.

data.name: Application_Name
data.value: Tweak Utility

data.name: Credits
data.value:
Lead Developer Craftplacer
Contributer Developers PF94, aka Gamerappa
Former Contributers Alien Future, aka Balázs Vámos
Translators Craftplacer (English, German) Alien Future (Hungarian) CatHR Games (Spanish) PF94 and Google Translate (French)
Icons Craftplacer (application icon) Microsoft Windows (for version specific icons, taken dynamically)
Tweak Sources AskVG (https://www.askvg.com)
⭐ And you for using this application ⭐

data.name: OneDrive_Uninstall_DeleteFolder
data.value: Would you like to delete the OneDrive folder?

data.name: OneDrive_Uninstall_DeleteFolder_Failed
data.value:
Failed to delete the OneDrive folder because of following error message:
{0}

data.name: OneDrive_Uninstall_InstallerNotFound
data.value:
The uninstall info for OneDrive couldn't be found. Therefore, OneDrive won't be automatically uninstalled, you can continue deleting directories and registry entries related to it.
Do you want to continue?

data.name: OneDrive_Uninstall_SetFlagMessage
data.value:
Currently, the "user initiated uninstallation" flag isn't set, possibly leading Windows into reinstalling OneDrive. Setting this flag will tell Windows that you want to keep OneDrive uninstalled.
Would you like to switch it on?

data.name: OneDrive_Uninstall_Success
data.value: OneDrive, along with its trails, have been deleted.

data.name: OneDrive_Uninstall_Warning
data.value:
The OneDrive uninstaller didn't seem to run correctly.
Do you want to continue?

data.name: Preferences
data.value: Preferences

data.name: Reload_ExplorerRestart
data.value:
This option requires you to restart Windows Explorer.
Would you like to do that now?

data.name: Reload_LogOff
data.value:
This option requires you to log off.
Would you like to do that now?

data.name: Reload_ProcessRestart
data.value:
This option requires all processes named "{0}" to be restarted.
Do you want to continue?

data.name: Reload_ProcessRestart_WaitingFor
data.value: Waiting for "{0}" to exit...

data.name: Reload_SystemRestart
data.value:
This option requires you to restart your system.
Would you like to do that now?

data.name: Reload_TweakUtility
data.value:
This option requires you to restart Tweak Utility.
Would you like to do that now?

data.name: Reload_Unknown
data.value:
This option requires you to reload the thing related to it, as there isn't a refresh implemented yet.
If you know how to implement this refresh programmatically, please let us know by clicking the feedback button in the about window.
data.comment: Message telling user to reload themself, since code is missing.

data.name: Report_Disclaimer
data.value: Please make sure this report doesn't contain any personal details accidentally picked up by this program. (That said we aren't reliable if you dox yourself.)

data.name: TweakPage_InsufficientPermissions
data.value: The tweak page {0} has failed to load because the application is running with insufficient permissions. You can try restarting the program as administrator.
